Verses: 1 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Vaanam Enakku Singaasanam, Boomi Enakkup Paadhapadi; Neengal Enakkuk Kattum Aalayam Eppadippattadhu? Naan Thangiyirukkum Sthalam Eppadippattadhu?

2 ennudaiya Karam Ivaigalaiyellaam Sirushtiththadhinaal Ivaigalellaam Undaayina Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Aanaalum Sirumaippattu Aaviyil Norungundu En Vasanaththukku Nadungugiravanaiye Nokkippaarppen.

3 maattai Vettugiravan Manushanaik Kollugiravanaagavum, Aattaip Paliyidugiravan Naayaik Kazhuththarukkiravanaagavum, Kaanikkaiyaip Padaikkiravan Pandri Raththaththaip Padaikkiravanaagavum, Thoobankaattugiravan Vikkiragaththai Sthoththirikkiravanaagavum Irukkiraan. Ivargal Thangal Vazhigalaiye Therindhukollugiraargal; Ivargaludaiya Aaththumaa Thangal Aruvaruppugalinmel Viruppamaayirukkiradhu.

4 naan Kooppittum Maruuththaravukodukkiravanillaamalum, Naan Pesiyum Avargal Kelaamalum, Avargal En Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Naan Virumbaadhadhaith Therindhukondadhinimiththam, Naanum Avargaludaiya Aabaththaith Therindhukondu, Avargaludaiya Thigilgalai Avargalmel Varappannuven.

5 karththarudaiya Vasanaththukku Nadungugiravargale, Avarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal; En Naamaththinimiththam Ungalaip Pagaiththu, Ungalai Appurappaduththugira Ungal Sagodharar, Karththar Magimaippaduvaaraaga Engiraargale. Avar Ungalukku Sandhosham Undaagumpadi Kaanappaduvaar; Avargalo Vetkappaduvaargal.
6 nagaraththilirundhu Amaliyin Iraichchalum Dhevaalayaththilirundhu Saththamum Ketkappadum; Adhu Thamadhu Saththurukkalukku Sarikku Sarikkattugira Karththarudaiyasaththandhaane.
7 prasavavedhanaippadumun Petraal, Karppavedhanai Varumun Aanpillaiyaip Petraal.

8 ippadippattavaigalaik Kelvippattadhu Yaar? Ippadippattavaigalaik Kandadhu Yaar? Oru Dhesaththukku Orenaalil Pillaipperu Varumo? Oru Jaadhi Orumikkap Pirakkumo? Seeyonovenil, Orumikka Vedhanaippattum Than Kumaararaip Petrum Irukkiradhu.
9 perappannugiravaraagiya Naan Perachcheyyaamal Iruppeno Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Prasavikkappannugiravaraagiya Naan Prasavaththaith Thaduppeno Endru Un Dhevan Sollugiraar.
10 erusalemai Nesikkira Neengalellaarum Avalodekooda Sandhoshappattu, Avalaikkuriththuk Kalikoorungal; Aval Nimiththam Dhukkiththirundha Neengalellaarum Avalodekooda Migavum Magizhungal.
11 neengal Avaludaiya Aarudhalgalin Mulaippaalai Undu Thirupthiyaagi, Neengal Sooppikkudiththu, Avaludaiya Magimaiyin Pragaasaththinaal Manamagizhchchiyaagungal;

12 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal Idho, Naan Samaadhaanaththai Oru Nadhiyaippolavum, Jaadhigalin Magimaiyaip Purandu Odugira Aatraippolavum Avalidamaagap Paayumpadi Seygiren, Appozhudhu Neengal Mulaippaal Kudippeergal; Iduppil Vaiththu Sumakkappaduveergal; Muzhangaalil Vaiththuth Thaalaattappaduveergal.
13 oruvanai Avan Thaai Thetruvadhupol Naan Ungalaith Thetruven; Neengal Erusalemile Thetrappaduveergal.

14 neengal Adhaik Kaanumpodhu, Ungal Irudhayam Magizhndhu, Ungal Elumbugal Pasumpullaip Polachchezhikkum; Appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Oozhiyakkaararidaththil Avarudaiya Karamum, Avarudaiya Saththurukkalidaththil Avarudaiya Sinamum Ariyappadum.

15 idho, Thammudaiya Kobaththai Ukkiramaagavum, Thammudaiya Kadindhukolludhalai Akkinijuvaalaiyaagavum Seluththak Karththar Akkiniyodum Varuvaar, Perunkaatraippondra Thammudaiya Radhangalodum Varuvaar.
16 karththar Akkiniyaalum, Thamadhu Pattayaththaalum, Maamsamaana Ellaarodum Vazhakkaaduvaar; Karththaraal Kolaiyundavargal Anegaraayiruppaargal.

17 thangalaith Thaangale Parisuththappaduththikkollugiravargalum, Thoppugalin Naduvile Thangalaith Thaangale Oruvar Pin Oruvaraai Suththigariththukkollugiravargalum, Pandriyiraichchiyaiyum, Aruvaruppaanadhaiyum, Eliyaiyum Saappidugiravargalum Egamaai Sangarikkappaduvaargal Endrukarththar Sollugiraar.
18 naan Avargal Kiriyaigalaiyum, Avargal Ninaivugalaiyum Arindhirukkiren; Naan Sagala Jaadhiyaaraiyum Baashaikkaararaiyun Koottichcherkkunkaalam Varum; Avargal Vandhu En Magimaiyaik Kaanbaargal.

19 naan Avargalil Oru Adaiyaalaththaik Kattalaiyiduven; Avargalil Thappinavargalai, En Keerththiyaik Kelaamalum, En Magimaiyaikkaanaamalumirukkira Jaadhigalin Dhesangalaagiya Tharsheesukkum Vilveerar Irukkira Poolukkum, Loodhukkum, Thoobaalukkum, Yaavaanukkum, Dhooraththilulla Theevugalukkum Anuppuven; Avargal En Magimaiyai Jaadhigalukkulle Arivippaargal.

20 isravel Puththirar Suththamaana Paaththiraththil Kaanikkaiyaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkuk Konduvarugiradhupola, Ungal Sagodhararellaaraiyum Avargal Kudhiraigalinmelum, Radhangalinmelum, Kulaarivandilgalinmelum, Koverukazhudhaigalinmelum, Vegamaana Ottagangalinmelum, Sagala Jaadhigalidaththilumirundhu Erusalemilulla Karththarukkuk Kaanikkaiyaaga En Parisuththa Parvadhaththukkuk Konduvaruvaargalendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
21 avargalilum Silarai Aasaariyaraagavum Leviyaraagavum Therindhukolven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
22 naan Padaikkappogira Pudhiyavaanamum Pudhiya Boomiyum Enakku Munbaaga Nirpadhupola, Ungal Sandhadhiyum Ungal Naamamum Nirkumendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
23 appozhudhu Maadhandhorum, Oivunaaldhorum, Maamsamaana Yaavarum Enakku Munbaagath Thozhudhukolvaargalendru Karththar Sollugiraar.

24 avargal Veliye Poi Enakku Virodhamaaip Paadhagancheydha Manusharudaiya Predhangalaip Paarppaargal; Avargaludaiya Poochchi Saagaamalum, Avargaludaiya Akkini Aviyaamalum Irukkum; Avargal Maamsamaana Yaavarukkum Arosigamaayiruppaargal.
